title: One Piece: Who is Condoriano from the G-8 Arc?
author: ComingSoon.net Editorial
description: A detailed explanation of the Condoriano meme from Episode 200, including the scene's context, how it became popular, and why fans refer to the character as 'Con D. Oriano'.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Only contains spoilers for the G-8 Arc (episodes 196-206)

title: One Piece: This Filler Arc Had the Funniest Joke in the Entire Show
author: GameRant Editorial
description: An article explaining why the Condoriano scene from the G-8 Arc is considered one of the funniest moments in One Piece, highlighting how it's perfectly in character for the Straw Hats and why it resonates with fans.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Focuses on the G-8 Arc with no spoilers beyond episode 206

title: One Piece: Who is Condoriano from the G-8 Arc?
author: Yahoo Entertainment
description: An explanation of the Condoriano meme, detailing how Usopp and Zoro gaslight Inspector Shepherd into believing he's a Straw Hat crew member, and why this scene became legendary in the One Piece community.

title: One Piece: 10 Best Filler Arcs, Ranked
author: Daksh Chaudhary
description: A comprehensive ranking of One Piece filler arcs, with the G-8 Arc ranked 4th. The article praises the arc's strategic maneuvering, character development, and notes it was originally conceived as a theatrical film.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the entire G-8 Arc but no spoilers beyond it

title: 200: 'Luffy and Sanji's Daring Rescue Mission!'
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A detailed episode review from a first-time watcher's perspective, highlighting the Die Hard-style ventilation infiltration, the Condoriano moment, and the comedic dial mix-up scene. The blogger praises the episode's humor and entertainment value.

title: One Piece Diaries #25: G-8 Arc
author: COMICON Editorial
description: A retrospective review of the entire G-8 Arc, praising it as the best filler arc in the series. Discusses the arc's quality, character moments, and why it stands out among filler content.

title: CONDORIANO?! CON D. ORIANO?! One Piece Funny Moments Reaction - Episodes 200 & 201
author: Reactor (Bilibili)
description: A reaction video covering episodes 200 and 201 of One Piece, with particular focus on the Condoriano scene. The reactor experiences the famous moment for the first time.

title: Best of One Piece G-8 Arc (REACTION)
author: Anime Reactor
description: A compilation reaction video showcasing the best moments from the G-8 Arc, including the Condoriano scene, strategic battles, and comedic highlights.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire G-8 Arc

title: The legend Con D. Oriano - One of the best scene in One Piece!
author: @gearfifthnika
description: A TikTok video highlighting the Condoriano scene as one of the best moments in One Piece, celebrating the meme and its lasting impact on the fandom.

title: Condoriano: The Ultimate One Piece Character Fan Favorite
author: @desnescitrus
description: A TikTok video celebrating Condoriano as a fan-favorite character, showcasing clips from Episode 200 and explaining the meme's significance.
